thread.section_title: Prince de Galles Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wow!
thread.title_full: Wow! - Review of Prince de Galles Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ymcebs
title: Wow!
text:
We have been to this hotel several times before, but now the hotel is after an extensive renovation, and it looks and feels great!
The service of the concierge and the front desk is very attentive,the room is very nice and the feeling of the hotel is pure luxury.
It is also in a great location, near Champs Elysee, on a relatively quiet street.
